homePage.sectionOneContentA: Protect your privacy with Jumping Spider's global VPN service.With fast connection speeds and servers in multiple countries,
homePage.sectionOneContentB: you can access any content anytime, anywhere.
homePage.sectionTwoContentA: Just pay the monthly fee easily and you can have high-quality URL connection VPN service.
homePage.sectionTwoContentB: Enterprise users also enjoy customized services, allowing them to freely connect via VPN using URLs or credentials to create a unique network environment.
homePage.sectionThreeContent: Install OpenVPN and enter the URL or credentials provided by Jumping Spider to open a secure connection channel locally, easily connect to the device, and explore the endless wonders of the virtual network.
homePage.sectionFourContentB: and establish a stable connection instantly.
homePage.sectionFourContentC: The certificate allows you to direct the VPN connection to the specified device,
homePage.sectionFiveSub: Enjoy an efficient and secure VPN connection
homePage.sectionFiveContent: Subscribe to Jumping Spider VPN now to create your own secure channel and experience new online freedom.

pricePage.description: Start your adventure and enjoy the exclusive VPN service now to protect your online security.
pricePage.planDescription: Jumping Spider VPN provides comprehensive customized services for enterprises, safe and stable. Unified management, undifferentiated price strategy, the best VPN solution.
pricePage.featureThree: Virtual network experience without regional restrictions
pricePage.reminder: Transaction confirmation takes 10 to 15 minutes. Please check the OpneVPN connection information in the profile later.
pricePage.failed: Payment Fail. Please confirm whether there is insufficient virtual currency balance or platform technical issues.

faqPage.title: FAQ
faqPage.description: The Spiderweb team is ready to provide fast and reliable assistance to ensure your VPN experience is worry-free and smooth.
faqPage.questionOne: How to install and configure OpenVPN？
faqPage.questionTwo: How to use Jumping Spider VPN simultaneously on different devices？
faqPage.questionThree: What are the options for customized services on the enterprise side？
faqPage.questionFour: The payment method only supports virtual currency wallets. Are there any other options？
faqPage.answerOne: We have a detailed installation guide that you can find at [ <tutorial>OpenVPN Tutorial</tutorial> ] with clear and concise steps. If you need further assistance, please feel free to contact us and our customer service team will be happy to help you complete the setup.
faqPage.answerTwo: Jumping Spider supports account synchronization. You only need to use the same account to log in to different devices, and you can easily synchronize it across devices. If you encounter problems during operation, our customer service will provide assistance at any time.
faqPage.answerThree: Our enterprise-side customized services cover many aspects, such as setting up dedicated VPN servers according to enterprise needs, customizing security protocols, and integrating enterprise internal authentication systems. Please contact our corporate customer service directly and we will provide a detailed explanation to ensure that your business's unique needs are met.
faqPage.answerFour: Currently, we only accept virtual currency wallets as a payment method. We continue to work hard to expand our payment options to provide more convenient choices. If you have any payment questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact customer service and we will be happy to assist you.
